§lEfficiency III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a cut copper slab (R) and a polished deepslate slab (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with three pieces of lapis across the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
R r§r

§lPower III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use an arrow (A), a piece of flint (F), and an amethyst shard (S) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with three pieces of lapis across the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
AFS§r

§lProtection III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a piece of nether quartz as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with three pieces of lapis across the top (L).
§lL L
 B 
 R §r

§lSharpness III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a piece of flint (R) and an amethyst shard (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with three pieces of lapis across the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
R r§r

§lUnbreaking III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a diamond as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with three pieces of lapis across the top (L).
